entry.title: Wednesday: Mainly cloudy. High plus 2.

entry.title: Wednesday night: Periods of snow. Low minus 2.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Periods of light snow beginning this evening. Fog patches dissipating this evening. Amount 2 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 2. Wind chill minus 4 overnight. Forecast issued 05:30 AM CST Wednesday 08 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Chance of flurries. High minus 1. POP 40%
